description: Determines frequency band covering at least 90% of the 'power' (|FFT|^2) of stimulus columns from X.nocensor.xmat.1D files.

verbose_flag.title: Verbose flag
verbose_flag.description: Print the power band for each individual stimulus column from each matrix.

additional_matrixfiles.title: Additional matrix files
additional_matrixfiles.description: Another way to read 1 or more matrix files.

min_freq.title: Minimum Frequency
min_freq.description: Set the minimum frequency output for the band. Default value is 0.01.

min_bwidth.title: Minimum Bandwidth
min_bwidth.description: Set the minimum bandwidth output (top frequency minus bottom frequency). Default is 0.03.

min_pow.title: Minimum Power Fraction
min_pow.description: Set the minimum power fraction (percentage) to 'ff' instead of the default 90%. Value must be in the range 50..99.
